EmailTemplate.description: Notify Users when a Service Request has been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Service Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Service Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__Application2__c.MUSW__Applicant__c},
Your service request {!MUSW__Application2__c.Name}-{!MUSW__Application2__c.MUSW__Type__c} has been received by the Department of Safety and Professional Services and will be processed. You will receive further communication when processing is complete.
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
